mapper.insert: insert into member_list (id, username, email, password, sex, phone, city, address, birthday, enable, hobby) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{city}, #{address}, #{birthday}, #{enable}, #{hobby})
mapper.select: select * from member_list left join files ON member_list.id = files.user_id left join text on member_list.id = text.user_id where member_list.id = #{id}
